sys_ui_page.html:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

<g:evaluate jelly="true">
	var kb = gs.getProperty('x_26961_mobile_a.knowledge_base_url', '');
	if(kb == '')
		kb = '/$knowledge.do';
</g:evaluate>
	<input type="hidden" id="kb_url" name='kb_url' value="${HTML:kb}" />
	<script>
		window.location.href = document.getElementById('kb_url').value;
	</script>
</j:jelly>
sys_ui_page.name: redirectToKnowledgeBase
